programme.title: NFL: America's Game

Championship: Millwall - Cardiff City
programme.desc: Championship je drugo najmočnejše ligaško tekmovanje v Angliji. V njem nastopa 24 klubov, ki si v 46. krogih skušajo priigrati dve izmed treh vozovnic, ki neposredno vodijo v Premier ligo. Zadnjega potnika med elito dobimo po »playoffu«, v katerega se uvrstijo moštva uvrščena od 3. do 6. mesta po rednem delu

programme.title: Pokal CEV (ž) - 1/8 finala: Nova KBM Branik - Yenisei
programme.desc: Ruska ekipa Yenisei Krasnoyarsk je prvo tekmo dobila s 3:0, toda slovenske predstavnice so se domov vseeno vrnile z optimizmom in odločene, da jo doma zagodejo ruskemu velikanu

programme.title: Nemški pokal - 1/4 finale: Paderborn - Bayern (M)
programme.desc: Bayern je absolutni vladar nemškega nogometa, vendar v lanski sezoni ostal brez zmage v pokalnem tekmovanju, kar želi že letos popraviti. Bi Paderborn lahko prekrižal načrte Bavarcem in poskrbel za veliko presenečenje?

programme.title: Spanish league: Prediction circle
programme.desc: Oglejte si vse zanimivosti pred novim krogom La Lige

programme.title: Premier league: Prediction circle
programme.desc: Oglejte si vse zanimivosti pred novim krogom Premier lige

programme.title: Evroliga - 22. Round: Crvena zvezda - Olimpia Milano
programme.desc: Pred Crveno zvezdo je nekaj ključnih tekem v lovu na končnico Evrolige. Milano je odpisan že nekaj časa, a z željo, da do konca sezone zbere čim več zmag. Bi italijanski predstavniki lahko prekrižali načrte Beograjčanom?(c)

programme.title: Europa League: Magazin
programme.desc: Po letih vladavine Seville so pred letom dni v Evropski ligi slavili nogometaši Manchester Uniteda, ki so si s tem priigrali tudi nastop v Ligi prvakov. Kdo bo rdeče vrage nasledil na prestolu? Vse zanimivosti o drugem najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju izveste v magazinu

programme.title: Live! Turška liga: Banvit - Buyukcekmece
programme.desc: Nadaljuje se izjemno zanimiva in izenačena turška košarkarska liga. Sašo Filipovski in Gašper Vidmar tokrat gostita Buyukcekmece. Se bosta veselila nove zmage?

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Magazin
programme.desc: Branilec naslova najmočnejšega klubskega nogometnega tekmovanja v Evropi je madridski Real, ki se je prek Atletica dokopal že do enajstega evropskega naslova. Kdo pa bo Ligo prvakov osvojil v novi sezoni? Vse zanimivosti o najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju izveste v tedenskem magazinu

programme.title: Live! Premier league: Tottenham - Arsenal
programme.desc: Vedno vroč severno londonski derbi tudi tokrat obljublja nogometno partijo za sladokusce. Sodeč po letošnjih rezultatih so favoriti Spursi, toda tudi topničarjev s starim lisjakom Arsenom Wengerjem ne gre odpisati prehitro

programme.title: Live! Spanish league: Malaga - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: Malaga se bo težko izognila izpadu v ligo Adelante, a to ne pomeni, da se bodo domači vnaprej predali proti madridskemu Atleticu. Colchonerosi bodo tudi tokrat potrebovali zanesljivega Jana Oblaka in razpoložene napadalce, v nasprotnem primeru bi jim Mlaga lahko hitro prekrižala načrte

programme.title: Live! Premier league: Manchester City - Leicester City
programme.desc: Manchester City nadaljuje svoj pohod proti angleškemu prvaku, medtem ko Leicester ne igra slabo in je blizu mestom, ki po koncu sezone vodijo v evropska tekmovanja. Bi lisice lahko presenetile na Etihadu in prišle do treh točk?

programme.title: Live! Spanish league: Real Madrid - Real Sociedad
programme.desc: Madridski Real se počasi pobira po seriji slabih rezultatov, vseeno pa je forma kraljevega kluba še vedno daleč od optimalne. Obračun s PSG-jem v ligi prvakov je tik pred vrati, zato bo Zinedine Zidane tudi proti Realu iz Sociedada zahteval napadalno igro od prve do zadnje minute

programme.title: Zmorem! (2018), 1. del
programme.desc: Zmorem! je prva oddaja na Sportklubu namenjena športnikom invalidom. V sodelovanju z Zvezo za šport invalidov - paraolimpijski komite in podjetjem Lidl Slovenija jo pripravljamo enkrat mesečno. V prijetnih dvajsetih minutah preverjamo dogajanje na tekmovanjih in poslušamo zgodbe športnikov invalidov. In zakaj ravno "Zmorem!"? Ker si upajo, ker ne odnehajo, ker so polni energije. Zmorejo, vsi športniki invalidi, ki jih predstavljamo v naši oddaji. Na sporedu v prvem tednu vsakega meseca

programme.desc: Vsi vrhunci 22. kroga Evrolige zbrani na enem mestu

programme.title: Live! NBA: Brooklyn - New Orleans
programme.desc: Liga NBA velja za najboljše košarkarsko tekmovanje na svetu, v katerem se merijo najboljši košarkarji. V ligi, ki je bila ustanovljena 6. junija 1946 v New Yorku, nastopa 30 ekip, ena od teh je kanadska. S 17 naslovi za najuspešnejšo ekipo tekmovanja v zgodovini velja Boston Celtics, v zadnjem letu pa so naslov osvojili košarkarji Golden Stata, ki so bili v finalu močnejši od Clevelanda LeBrona Jamesa

programme.title: NBA: Live
programme.desc: Pregled dnevnega dogajanja v ligi NBA

programme.title: Futsal, Evropsko prvenstvo 2018 - Tekma za 3. mesto: Rusija - Kazahstan
programme.desc: Rusi so brez finala ostali tudi po zaslugi nekaterih sumljivih sodniških odločitev, zato bodo zagotov imeli še nekaj dodatnega motiva, da prvenstvo zaključijo z zmago. Kazahstanci so morali na drugi strani šele po kazenskih strelih priznati premoč Španiji. Kdo bo prvenstvo končal na stopničkah?(c)

programme.title: Trans World Sport, 1606. del
programme.desc: Šport je sredstvo množic, kjer se sprostijo pozitivna energija in dobro počutje. Tudi zaradi tega je Trans World Sport oddaja, ki je letos praznovala že 29 letnico delovanja

programme.title: Italijanska liga (m): Perugia - Lube
programme.desc: Lega Pallavolo Serie A je najprestižnejše ligaško odbojkarsko tekmovanje v Italiji. V njej nastopa 13 ekip. Aktualni državni prvaki so odbojkarji Modene. Lega Palavolo Serie A velja za najboljšo odbojkarsko ligo na svetu

programme.title: Futsal, Evropsko prvenstvo 2018 - Finale: Španija - Portugal
programme.desc: Pred nami je sklepno dejanje evropskega prvenstva v futsalu v Stožicah. Španija ali Portugalska? Španci branijo naslov in so se v finale prebili šele po kazenskih strelih, Portugalci pa tudi z nekaj sodniške pomoči. Zmagovalca je nemogoče napovedati, zagotovo pa lahko napovemo, da nas za zaključek čaka futsal spektakel v pravem pomenu besede(c)

V prijetnih dvajsetih minutah preverjamo dogajanje na tekmovanjih in poslušamo zgodbe športnikov invalidov. In zakaj ravno "Zmorem!"? Ker si upajo, ker ne odnehajo, ker so polni energije. programme.title: Netherlands league: Roda - Ajax
programme.desc: Eredivisie je najvišje rangirano klubsko nogometno tekmovanje na Nizozemskem. Liga je bila ustanovljena leta 1956. Najuspešnejši klub je amsterdamski Ajax, ki je osvojil kar 33 naslovov državnega prvaka, sledita mu PSV (23) in Feyenoord, ki je tudi aktualni prvak (15). Od leta 1965 dalje je trem omenjenim klubom uspelo osvojiti večino državnih naslovov. Izjemi sta leti 1981 ter 2009, ko so se veselili nogometaši AZ-ja iz Alkmaarja ter leto 2010, ko je naslov romal v roke Twenteja

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Cross-Country, Curling (Mixed Doubles): U.S. vs. China
programme.sub-title: Cross-Country, Curling (Mixed Doubles): U.S. vs. China
programme.desc: Team USA faces China in mixed doubles curling, while women cross-country skiers compete for the skiathlon gold medal. China has placed in the last two World Mixed Doubles Curling Championships and should be in contention again in PyeongChang. Marit Bjoergen (10 total Olympic medals) seeks her third straight Olympic gold in the skiathlon, which would see her become the most decorated woman in Winter Games history. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Short Track
programme.desc: Short track skaters race for gold in the men's 1500m final and women's qualifying in the 500m and 3000m relay begins. South Korea will be a crowd favorite to grab the gold in the men's 1500m, but it will have to knock off Canada's Charles Hamelin, the gold medal winner at Sochi in 2014. Maame Biney, only 18 years old, is expected to lead Team USA in the women's 500m. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Ski Jumping, Snowboarding
programme.desc: The gold medal final in men's ski jumping (individual normal hill) and men's slopestyle qualification in snowboarding. Ski jumpers take to the Alpensia Ski Jumping Centre hoping to knock off Poland's Kamil Stoch, the reigning Olympic gold medalist. Slopestyle sees the men take on the challenging and complex Pheonix Snow Park. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Luge *
programme.desc: Luge hits the track in PyeongChang with the men's singles competition. Chris Mazdzer, a two-time Olympian from the U.S., hopes to dispatch Felix Loch and a Germany team that took the gold medal in the event at the 2014 Olympics in Sochi. Austria's Wolfgang Kindl is a threat in the event as well, winning the 2017 FIL World Luge Championship. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Speed Skating, Biathlon, Curling (Mixed Doubles): U.S. vs. Norway *
programme.sub-title: Speed Skating, Biathlon, Curling (Mixed Doubles): U.S. vs. Norway
programme.desc: Events include: the women's speedskating 3000m gold medal final, the 7.5km women's biathlon, and mixed doubles curling. Ireen Wuqest (Netherlands) and Claudia Pechstein (Germany) face off yet again in speedskating, while Susan Dunklee (U.S.) tries to give the Americans their first Olympic medal in the biathlon. Norway faces the U.S. in mixed doubles curling. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Track and Field: New Balance Indoor Championships
programme.desc: New Balance Indoor Grand Prix competition in Boston. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Figure Skating: Olympic Ice, Snowboarding
programme.desc: Snowboarding picks up as athletes compete for the gold in men's slopestyle, plus Olympic Ice for figure skating news and analysis. Team USA's hopes of repeating its slopestyle gold from Sochi lie with Chris Corning and Red Gerard, both Olympic newcomers. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Curling (Mixed Doubles): U.S. vs. Finland, Snowboarding
programme.sub-title: Curling (Mixed Doubles): U.S. vs. Finland, Snowboarding
programme.desc: Snowboarders take to the slopes for qualifying in women's slopestyle, plus U.S. vs. Finland in mixed doubles curling. Team USA's Jamie Anderson, the winner of the first-ever Olympic gold in women's slopestyle, is a favorite once again in PyeongChang. Newcomers Julia Marino and Hailey Langland are also expected to contend for the U.S. In curling, American siblings Matt and Becca Hamilton face Finland's Oona Kauste and Tomi Rantamaki. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Curling (Mixed Doubles): Canada vs. South Korea *
programme.sub-title: Curling (Mixed Doubles): Canada vs. South Korea
programme.desc: Canada meets South Korea in a mixed doubles curling match from the Gangneung Curling Centre. Canadians John Morris and Kaitlyn Lawes both have curling gold medals from past Olympics, but have only competed together a few times in mixed doubles. South Korea is represented by Jang Hye-ji and Lee Ki-jeong. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Hockey (Women's Group A): U.S. vs. Finland
programme.sub-title: Hockey (Women's Group A): U.S. vs. Finland
programme.desc: Group A debuts at Kwandong Hockey Centre as Team USA and Finland drop the puck in the women's hockey tournament. Team USA beat the Finns in the group stage at Sochi, but ultimately lost to Canada for the gold. The two rivals are co-favorites yet again. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Speed Skating, Biathlon, Cross-Country
programme.desc: Men compete for gold medals in the biathlon (10km sprint), speedskating (5000m) and cross-country skiing (skiathlon). Team USA's Lowell Bailey is a challenger in the 10km sprint, an event dominated by Norway (seven medals in the last five Olympics). Dutch speedskater Sven Kramer looks to grab a third straight Olympic gold in the men's 5000m, while Switzerland's Dario Cologna is out to defend his skiathon gold medal from Sochi. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Premier League Soccer: Newcastle United vs. Manchester United
programme.desc: Newcastle United vs. Manchester United. From St James' Park. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Premier League Live
programme.desc: News, highlights and analysis of English Premier League soccer. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Premier League Soccer: Southampton vs. Liverpool
programme.desc: Southampton vs. Liverpool. From St. Mary's Stadium. (live) (cc)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Curling (Mixed Doubles Tiebreaker), Luge, Medal Ceremonies *
programme.sub-title: Curling (Mixed Doubles Tiebreaker), Luge, Medal Ceremonies
programme.desc: Pairs take to the ice for a mixed doubles curling tiebreaker, plus the men's luge singles finals and medal ceremonies. Curlers face off for a spot in the semifinals, while American Chris Mazdzer bids to upset Germany's Felix Loch in luge singles. Loch is bidding for a third-straight Olympic gold, a feat only fellow German Georg Hackl has accomplished in men's singles. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Figure Skating: Olympic Ice, Biathlon *
programme.desc: The biathlon looks to excite with the men's 10km sprint gold medal final, plus Olympic Ice for figure skating news and analysis. Norway took home the gold in the 10km sprint at the 2014 Sochi Olympics and are tipped for more success in PyeongChang. France's Martin Fourcade amassed two golds and a silver across biathlon events in Sochi, with the 10km sprint the only individual event alluding him. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Snowboarding, Curling (Mixed Doubles Semifinal #1)
programme.desc: Women snowboarders hit the course vying for gold in slopestyle, plus a semifinal in mixed doubles curling. American Jamie Anderson won gold in the inaugural event at Sochi and is a favorite here, along with teammates Julia Marino and Hailey Langland. Pairs take to the ice in the Gangneung Curling Centre for the first mixed doubles semifinal to see which country gets a place in the first mixed doubles curling gold medal final at an Olympic Games. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Snowboarding, Curling (Mixed Doubles Semifinal #1), Speed Skating *
programme.sub-title: Snowboarding, Curling (Mixed Doubles Semifinal #1), Speed Skating
programme.desc: Semifinals in mixed doubles curling, plus finals in women's snowboarding (slopestyle) and the men's speed skating 5000m. Pairs hit the ice at the Gangneung Curling Centre for a spot in the inaugural gold medal match in mixed doubles curling. Team USA won the first-ever Olympic gold in women's slopestyle at Sochi, and are favorites to defend it here. The Dutch speed skating team remain the front runners for the podium in the men's 5000m in speed skating, where Emery Lehman represents the U.S. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Hockey (Women's Group B): Switzerland vs. Japan
programme.sub-title: Hockey (Women's Group B): Switzerland vs. Japan
programme.desc: Women's ice hockey from the Kwandong Centre as Japan takes on Switzerland in Group B action. The Swiss squad is looking to improve on their 2014 bronze medal finish, while the Japanese team is led by veteran goaltender Nana Fujimoto. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Biathlon, Luge
programme.desc: Coverage of the women's luge singles competition (runs 1 & 2) and the women's biathlon pursuit gold medal final. Luge action runs at the Olympic Sliding Centre with women's biathlon from the Alpensia Biathlon Centre. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Freestyle Skiing, Hockey (Women's Group B): Sweden vs. Korea, Luge
programme.sub-title: Freestyle Skiing, Hockey (Women's Group B): Sweden vs. Korea, Luge
programme.desc: Sweden vs. Korea women's ice hockey. Men's freestyle skiing moguls gold medal final. Women's singles luge. Korea's women take on a Swedish hockey team that's won silver and bronze in the 2006 and 2002 Olympics. The men's freestyle skiers will be battling for the top step as they take on the moguls course at the Phoenix Snow Park. High-speed action in the women's singles luge competition continues at the Olympic Sliding Centre. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Olympics 2018: Ski Jumping, Biathlon, Speed Skating *
programme.desc: Women's individual ski jumping, men's biathlon pursuit and women's 1500m speedskating all going for gold medals. Women ski jumpers are in their second Olympics as they take on the normal hill at the Alpensia Ski Jumping Centre. In another battle for the top step, the men combine cross country skiing and target shooting in the biathlon pursuit. The women skaters hit the ice in the chase for gold in the 1500m race. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Super Bowl LII: Philadelphia Eagles vs. New England Patriots
programme.sub-title: Philadelphia Eagles vs. New England Patriots
programme.desc: Philadelphia Eagles vs. New England Patriots at U.S. Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, which last hosted in 1992. Justin Timberlake performs at halftime. Bill Belichick's Patriots bid for a record-tying sixth Super Bowl win, while Philly chases its first, having last appeared 13 years ago in a 24-21 loss to New England. Deion Branch was MVP of that game, with QB Tom Brady taking MVP honors in the other four Pats wins. Tight ends Rob Gronkowski (Pats) and Zach Ertz (Eagles) are key scoring threats. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLI: 2007: Bears vs. Colts
programme.desc: From 2007: Chicago vs. Indianapolis in Miami. Indianapolis forced five Bears turnovers and controlled the clock with their ground game in a 29-17 victory. Colts QB Peyton Manning was selected MVP. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLII: 2008: Patriots vs. Giants
programme.desc: From 2008: New England vs. New York Giants in Glendale, Ariz. New York won 17-14 when Eli Manning hit Plaxico Burress with a TD pass with 35 seconds remaining, ending the Patriots' quest for a perfect season. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLIII: 2009: Cardinals vs. Steelers
programme.desc: From 2009: Arizona vs. Pittsburgh at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa. The Steelers won their sixth Super Bowl with a thrilling 27-23 win that featured a 100-yard INT return for a TD and a memorable TD grab by WR Santonio Holmes. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLIV: 2010: Saints vs. Colts
programme.desc: From 2010: New Orleans vs. Indianapolis in Miami Gardens, Fla. The Saints won 31-17, with Drew Brees completing 32 passes to tie a Super Bowl record. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLV: 2011: Packers vs. Steelers
programme.desc: From 2011: Green Bay vs. Pittsburgh at Cowboys Stadium in Arlington, Texas. The Packers won 31-25, with Aaron Rodgers throwing 3 TD passes. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLVI: 2012: Patriots vs. Giants
programme.desc: From 2012: New England vs. New York Giants in Indianapolis. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLVII: 2013: Ravens vs. 49ers
programme.desc: From 2013: Baltimore vs. San Francisco in New Orleans. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLVIII: 2014: Broncos vs. Seahawks
programme.desc: From 2014: Denver vs. Seattle in East Rutherford, N.J. (cc)

programme.title: Super Bowl XLIX: Patriots vs. Seahawks
programme.desc: New England vs. Seattle in Glendale, Ariz. (cc)
